fullplot: Esa is a small time crook who has been precisely released from prison. He starts to make money by mugging people. One day psychiatrist Lindstrèm rings Esa's doorbell. He has a very strange request: he wants Esa to maltreat him. Esa accepts this request, but he is not aware of Lindstrèm's bad intentions.
